Name: Fruit Hunter
About the game: Gameplay Hunt for fruit with your bow and magic-wand-with-fork. Fruit will try and run away but you need to be quick enough to capture them. Collect enough fruit to fill your bowl and progress to the next mission. Environments Experience the 4 different regions, dark forest, plains, hot desert and rocky volcano. Traverse these landscapes in order to find the fruits that are hiding. Be cautious of the terrain as the different regions each have their own difficulties. Overcome your obstacles and ultimately fill all of your fruit bowls.
